attributes.action: Let the People Decide: Call for a National Referendum on Immigration Policy
attributes.additional_details:
We believe that a public vote is the most effective way to restore trust and demonstrate respect for the voices of everyday citizens. The consequences of inaction—escalating tensions, misinformation, and division—are too great to ignore.

We urge the Government to act responsibly and swiftly by initiating this referendum
attributes.background: Let the People Decide: Call for a National Referendum on Immigration Policy

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Hold a referendum on stopping immigration into the UK for 30 years
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730009
